dune 12, 2
MEMORANDUM
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division, GUSA C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-X (99-472)
THE requested procurement of two welders as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are avail- able, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipsont to Taiwan.
Pertinent Reports of Excess Equipment are also attached herowith
ancl. Reports List
cc: JGwhite (with list) THE (with list) BES (with list) 20 (with list)
